### Invitation to Qualify: Lobby Partial Roof Replacement at Fredericton Research and Development Centre

#### Solicitation Details

* **Title:** Invitation to Qualify: Lobby Partial Roof Replacement, Fredericton, NB
* **Reference Number:** WS4243498296-Doc4312016475
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-16
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-28T14:00:00

#### Work Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking to appointment a contractor to supply and install new 2-ply modified bitumen roofing membranes on the lobby roof and replace the water-damaged gypsum board ceiling in the lobby area of Building 95 at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre, 95 Innovation Rd, Fredericton, NB.

#### Tender Process

* **Method of Bid Announcement:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Tender Status:** Exired (Expired)

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contract Value:** Not Applicable
* **Contract Terms:** The Contractor shall perform and complete the work within 12 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Johnston, Edward (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18029250?extsite=MTgwMjkyNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

You can obtain the detailed documentation of the tender by visiting the above link.
